text: okavela atanu (muham'mad!) Mi andariki vidakuliste! Allah, miku baduluga, mikante manci bharyalanu, ataniki (pravaktaku) prasadincagaladu! Varu manci muslinlu, visvasulu, bhaktiparulu, pascattapa padevaru, (allah nu) aradhincevaru, valasa poye (upavasalu cese) varu ayina, vidhavalu leda kan'yalu ayi untaru
